elements.html:
About this survey

In the context of my master's thesis, I am collecting data to better understand how to improve the players' experience through game adaptivity.

To that end, you need to answer a few questions about yourself, which are divided into 3 categories: demographics (age, gender, and level of education), personality (how do you see yourself in certain situations), and gaming experience (how many times did you play platforming games).

After this questionnaire, you will be presented with levels where some elements might be missing. After playing each level, you will be given a set of questions regarding these elements, so please pay attention to the following game elements:

After playing and answering the questionnaires, you have the opportunity to give me some feedback regarding the overall experience. This survey should take about 15 minutes to complete.

Please answer as honestly as possible.

Disclaimer

The data collected in this survey will be used only for statistics. There are no questions or types of tracking that can identify who you are.

All the data collected will be handled responsibly for the purpose of this master's thesis and may be published in a journal or presented at a conference. By proceeding with this questionnaire, you acknowledge the collection and analysis of your data.

If you experience any problems loading the levels, please check your Internet connection or try with another browser.

Any questions can be sent to up201705160@edu.fe.up.pt.

elements.name: Gender
elements.title: What gender do you identify as?

elements.name: Education
elements.title: What is the highest degree or level of education you have completed?

elements.name: personality-questionnaire
elements.title: I see myself as someone who...

rows.text: ...is considerate and kind to almost everyone.
I have experience with video games (in general).
I have experience with the platform game genre.
I have experience playing Super Mario Bros.
I am acquainted with Super Mario Bros. mechanics.

elements.html:
About the levels

As mentioned before, you will be presented with levels where some elements might be missing. After playing each level, you will be given a set of questions regarding these elements, so please pay attention to the following game elements:

The questionnaire is straightforward, and you only need to say if the elements improved or not the overall experience in the level by stating your level of satisfaction. If you do not see the said element, either because you lost before seeing it or won without seeing it, please state that it does not apply to that level.

Above the level, you can see your progress in the experimentation. Please do not leave the page before ending all the levels since we won't be able to track your progress.

Inside the level you will probably miss some interface elements such as the score or the world number. These elements, although removed from the interface, are present in the game, so please play as you would in a normal Super Mario game.

Any further questions can be sent to up201705160@edu.fe.up.pt.

Instructions to Play

Move Left
Move Right
Move faster / Shoot (requires fire upgrade)
Jump
